validity_codes.description: Entity name must be properly declared. Check spelling, imports, and scope.
common_causes: Typo in feature or variable name

validity_codes.description: Target must be attached (not void). Use 'if attached' pattern or ensure initialization.
common_causes: Calling feature on potentially void reference

validity_codes.description: Type must be a valid class name. Check that class exists and is properly imported.
Feature name must be unique within class. Check for conflicting feature names.
Type must conform to expected type. Check inheritance hierarchy and conversions.
Precondition must be equal or weaker than parent. Use 'require else' for additional alternatives.
Precondition violation. Ensure all required conditions are met before calling feature.
Feature redefinition must maintain signature compatibility. Check parameter and return types.
Postcondition must be equal or stronger than parent. Use 'ensure then' to add guarantees.
Once feature cannot be called on separate target. Check SCOOP usage.
common_causes: Calling once feature in concurrent context
